definition: aware intuitively or intellectually of something sensed
details:
adjective
- aware intuitively or intellectually of something sensed
= example: aware intuitively or intellectually of something sensed
- readily perceived by the senses
= example: readily perceived by the senses
- showing reason or sound judgment
= example: showing reason or sound judgment
= synonyms: reasonable
- able to feel or perceive
= example: able to feel or perceive
= synonyms: sensitive
